page.title: 04Ghosts of Chapel St Leonards
page.content: In Chapel there is a place called the Grange.Behind the Grange is a black house.Two ghosts haunt that house.Once someone found a dagger stuck in the roof.The most frightening bit is theres two ghosts that haunt the Grange because the couple died.But before the man died he decided to move the furniture round.So when he died the man and wife haunt it and keep moving the furniture.The same ghosts move over to the black house and light a little fire and dance round it to worship it.This house has never been lived in for fifty seven years.Half the population dont beleive in ghosts but I do.
